name: World of Warships Replay File
summary: Learn about .WOWSREPLAY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WOWSREPLAY files do not store actual video data. The files store recorded locations, movements, and actions by each of the players, which allows the replay to be re-simulated in the software.
NOTE: WOWSREPLAY files are saved to the \​World of Warships\​replays\​ installation directory if replay recording is enabled in the game options.

description: A WOWSREPLAY file is a game file created by World of Warships (WoWS), a multiplayer warship battling game. It contains a multiplayer battle replay that can be played back at a later time. WOWSREPLAY files are useful for analyzing game strategy or reporting game bugs or violations by other players.
